product_name: Women's Horlicks Health and Nutrition Drink, 400 gm, Caramel Flavor Jar (No Added Sugar): Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_body: Owesem product advise every woman or girl to have this product .. I bought this for my mother but now I'm  also edict to this product ,if in the night I'm not having this then after that my morning is spoil...Girl do get on ur hand..

Hi All,I have tried a lot of malts in the past. To name a few brands - Boost was one of my favourites , Bournvita was second favourite I stopped using bournvita because after sometime you will not like the chocolate flavour anymore and Now my favourite brand is HORLICKS. It comes in different flavours like chocolate, caramel, classic, kesar badam and elaichi. I don't really liked the chocolate flavour much though all other flavours are extremely addictive.In terms of price. It is very costly. 500gms of classic refill pack cost more than 200 Rs.'Classic' variant was once sold with the 'regular' name. It is the lowest cost variant among other flavours. It tastes as great as other flavours. Honestly you need not have to go for other flavours. The classic one is as delicious as Elaichi, Kesar badam or caramel.Caramel taste is just like alpenliebe toffee. I will definitely buy again.To make your Hot cup of milk you need to add three heaped spoon of the malt into the boiled hot milk and stir immediately to avoid forming lumps and stir it for few seconds. You need not have to add sugar at all as this will give just enough sweetness to your drink. Enjoy this warm drink at night before bed :)Hope this review is helpful to you.

reviews.review_title: Don't know about its health benefits, but it tastes good.
reviews.review_body: A friend highly suggested I should start using this daily, coz women need all these nutritional supplements at my age. So I bought it.One thing I didn't understand is why the manufacturers have put in both calcium and iron. Anywhere you read on the internet, it says that iron and calcium inhibit each other's absorption, so shouldn't be taken together.I checked many other such health drink mixes. All have the same problem. So either these manufacturers have got their fundae wrong, or all those websites on the internet are spreading falsehood.Anyway, I decided to stop using it until I got clarity on this issue.It tastes really good though. You are tempted to just eat it straight out of the box. So if you can afford it for its taste alone, go for it.
Women Horlicks is really good for above 40yrs old lady,my Mom using this product since last 4years,only flavour will be vary,she is really like to drink it after mixing with warm milk
Can't verify the nutrition value that this product offers I bought this for my wife, she seems to like it. Probably for the taste
Product is good for healthy bones even my doctor recommended me this product. But if you talk about flavor chocolate flavor of this is better than caramel.
My mom had a improvement since she was suffered from nutrition deficiency. I recommend this product
Exceptional product. Induces sleep and a good energy. Can see the results in a week. Awesome taste.
